abilities.name: Adventurous Appetite
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may look at the top 6 cards of your opponent's deck and discard any number of Item cards you find there. Your opponent shuffles the other cards back into their deck.

attacks.name: Gunk Shot
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
